dèng
surname Deng
фамилия Дэн
purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 鄧)
Pictophonetic: 登 indicates the sound; 阝 (place) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
邓小平理论 [ dèng xiǎo píng lǐ lùn ]: Deng Xiaoping Theory; Dengism; the foundation of PRC economic development after the Cultural Revolution, building the capitalist economy within Chinese Communist Party control
毛邓三 [ máo dèng sān ]: Mao Zedong Thought, Deng Xiaoping Theory & the Three Represents; abbr. for 毛泽东思想
邓世昌 [ dèng shì chāng ]: Deng Shichang (1849-1894), Qing dynasty naval specialist, founded naval dockyards and two naval colleges, died heroically in action against the Japanese
邓亚萍 [ dèng yà píng ]: Deng Yaping (1973-), table tennis player, several times world and Olympic winner
邓加 [ dèng jiā ]: Dunga (1963-), former Brazilian soccer player
purpleculture_tree:

    • 阝 [ yì ] place, town, city
heisig_chinese_memo: Deng Xiaoping (famous leader of the communist party) sat in the city walls his whole life scratching his crotch, observing his people, and thinking about new political systems.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Deng Xiaoping (famous leader of the communist party) sat in the city walls his whole life scratching his crotch, observing his people, and thinking about how to create better stepladders for the city folk.

邓字的基本解释

邓
（鄧）
dèng
姓。

邓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dèng］
［《廣韻》徒亘切，去嶝，定。］
“邓1”的繁体字。
(1)古国名。曼姓。在今河南省邓州市。后灭于楚。
(2)古地名。春秋蔡地，后属楚。在今河南省郾城县东南。
(3)古地名。春秋鲁地。在今山东省汶河以南、运河以北地区。
(4)古地名。战国魏邑。在今河南省孟县西南。
(5)古国名。战国楚地，秦置邓县，是故邓侯国。在今河南省邓州市。
(6)逗弄，揶揄。
(7)用同“澄”。滤筛沉淀。参见“鄧沙”。
(8)用同“鈍”。迟笨貌。参见“鄧鄧呆呆”。
(9)姓。

邓字的康熙字典解释

【補遺】【酉集】【邑字部】　邓； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1268第03
【搜眞玉鏡】音山。地名。

（鄧）【唐韻】徒亘切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】唐亘切，?音蹬。【說文】曼姓之國。【春秋·桓七年】鄧侯吾離來朝。【疏】鄧，在南地，屬衡岳。　又魯地。【春秋·隱十年】春，齊侯、鄭伯盟于鄧。【註】鄧，魯地。　又蔡地。【春秋·桓二年】蔡侯、鄭伯會于鄧。【註】潁川召陵縣西南有鄧城。【疏】賈、服以鄧爲國，釋例以此爲蔡地，其鄧國則義陽鄧縣是也。以鄧是小國，去蔡遠，蔡、鄭懼楚而爲此會，不當反求近楚小國與之結援，故知非鄧國也。　又州名。本秦南陽郡，隋置南陽縣，攺鄧州。　又姓。【姓考】殷武丁封叔父于河北，爲鄧侯，後因氏。
（鄧）考證：〔【春秋·桓十年】鄧侯離吾來朝。〕　謹照原文十年改七年。離吾改吾離。
邓字的源字形

邓字的起名意思

：古国名，今是中国的一个姓氏。我们中国的领导人邓小平就是一个邓姓名人。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dèng］
["Guangyun" cuts, goes, and sets. ]
Traditional characters for "邓1".
(1) Ancient country name. Man surname. In today's Dengzhou City, Henan Province. After being destroyed in Chu.
(2) Ancient place names. Cai Di in the Spring and Autumn Period, later belonged to Chu. In today's southeast of Licheng County, Henan Province.
(3) Ancient place names. Spring and Autumn Lu land. In today's Shandong Province, south of the Wenhe River and north of the Canal.
(4) Ancient place names. Wei Yi in the Warring States Period. In today's southwest of Meng County, Henan Province.
(5) Ancient country name. During the Warring States Period, the land of Chu, the Qin Dynasty set Deng County, is the old Deng Hou State. In today's Dengzhou City, Henan Province.
(6) Teasing, teasing.
(7) Use the same as "Cheng". Filter the precipitation. See "Deng Sha".
(8) Use the same as "blunt". Clumsy appearance. See "Deng and Deng dull".
(9) Last name.
Deng
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Addendum] [You Ji] [Yi Zi Department] 　 Deng; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 1268 03
【Search for Jade Mirror】Yinshan. Place name. (Deng) [Tang Yun] Tu Gen cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Tang Gen cut,? Sound pedal. [Said Wen] The country with the surname Man. [Spring and Autumn·Huan Seven Years] Deng Houwu left the court. [Sparse] Deng belongs to Hengyue in Nandi.　Rudily. [Chunqiu·Hidden Ten Years] In the spring, Qihou and Zheng Bo allied Yu Deng. [Note] Deng, Lu Di.　 Cai Di again. [Spring and Autumn · Huan Second Year] Cai Hou and Zheng Bohui Yu Deng. [Note] There is Dengcheng in the southwest of Zhaoling County, Yingchuan. [Shu] Jia and Fu regard Deng as their country, and the example uses this as Caidi, and the country of Deng is also in Deng County, Yiyang. Since Deng is a small country, when I go to Cai Yuan, Cai and Zheng are afraid of Chu and will meet for this reason. They improperly seek assistance from a small country near Chu.　Also the name of the state. This is Nanyang County of Qin Dynasty, Nanyang County was established in Sui Dynasty, and Dengzhou was located in Sui Dynasty.　Another last name. [Surname test] Yin Wu Ding Feng's uncle was Deng Hou in Hebei, and Hou Yin's name. (Deng) Textual research: [[Spring and Autumn·Huan Ten Years] Deng Hou left me to come to court. 〕 　 I would like to change the original ten years to seven years. Leave me to change my leave.
Deng
Source glyph
Deng
Name meaning
: The name of an ancient country, today is a surname in China. Our Chinese leader Deng Xiaoping is a man named Deng.
邓
形声字。邑(B)表意,“邑”的上部代表居住之地,下部像人形,表示城镇;登(deng )表声。声旁简化。本义是古国名,
在今河南邓县,公元前678年被楚国所灭。现多用作姓。
①地名用字:一县。②姓。

Дэн
Пиктофонетические символы.
Яп (В) означает, что верхняя часть «Ага» представляет место жительства, а нижняя часть подобна человеческой фигуре, что означает город, Дэн (deng) выражает звук.
Голосовое упрощение.
Первоначальное значение - название древней страны, разрушенной Чу в 678 г. до н.э. в уезде Дэн провинции Хэнань.
Сейчас это чаще всего используется как фамилия.
①В названии места используются слова: графство.
② Фамилия.
~ Округ
